TopicTitle: How do you change the orientation of parts?

Articles.Content: Simple, if I can how do I do that. Say being able to make a lander can land upside down in dire circumstances, or better yet; land in any orientation
the WASD keys and QE. Hold shift and it will make smaller adjustments

you can rotate parts by using the wasdqe keys in the vab and sph and holding shift while doing this allows you to make finer adjustments

edit: damn ninja's lol
To clarify, the keys normally make parts rotate 90 degrees. If you hold shift, they rotate in 5 degree increments.
